name: Automania (Manic Mechanic) (MSX)
description:
This version is the final version of the game submitted in the MSXdev22 contest. It has some improvements compared to that first version:

  • Reduced the difficulty of the game so that it is not frustrating to play (detection of collisions with enemies).
  • Music in the menu, credits and during the game, both for MSX-1 and MSX-2 (play more than one channel).
  • Variation of the background of the screen (colors, bricks) in some stages.
